org.springframework.jms.connection

接口 SmartConnectionFactory

  • 所有超级接口:
    ConnectionFactory
    所有已知实现类:
    DelegatingConnectionFactory

    public interface SmartConnectionFactory
extends ConnectionFactory
    Extension of the javax.jms.ConnectionFactory interface, indicating how to release Connections obtained from it.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.2
    作者:
    Juergen Hoeller

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean shouldStop(Connection con)
      Should we stop the Connection, obtained from this ConnectionFactory?

      • 从接口继承的方法 javax.jms.ConnectionFactory

        createConnection, createConnection, createContext, createContext, createContext, createContext

    • 方法详细资料

      • shouldStop

        boolean shouldStop(Connection con)
        Should we stop the Connection, obtained from this ConnectionFactory?
        参数:
        con - the Connection to check
        返回:
        whether a stop call is necessary
        另请参阅:
        Connection.stop()
